cs.DC, cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.Distributed and Parallel Computing. 

The paper discusses a system architecture for efficient distributed GPU-based deep learning, which involves topics related to distributed computing, machine learning, computer vision, and neural networks. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing), followed by cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition), cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing), and cs.Distributed and Parallel Computing.
